Document.title: Resume Ilya Nikishin
Document.description: Resume Ilya Nikishin - Senior Frontend Developer

Sber.title: Sberbank
Sber.description:
Developed the SberBusiness project, which has over a million users.
Led frontend development for my team, teaching and mentoring new developers.
Acted as Scrum Master, distributing workload and ensuring team efficiency.
Organized and spoke at internal events for the frontend community.
Migrated the project to Webpack 5 and Module Federation, resulting in a 3x speedup on a cold build
 and a 2x speedup on a rebuild.

NTC.title: Scientific Technical Center «Industrial Safety»
NTC.description:
Maintained and developed new services and websites for the company.
Created an internal requests service for employees, including integration with Active Directory.
Modernized the technical stack and addressed performance issues with slow-running apps.
Set up and maintained company web servers and virtual machines.

RGA.title: Russian go-club association
RGA.description:
Developed web and mobile systems for the «Russian Go-Club Association» and «Starykh Gallery» projects.
Built a custom CI/CD tool to manage app builds and releases.
Redesigned the authorization system, eliminating a critical vulnerability.
Set up and maintained company server and SaaS services.
Developed an interactive art gallery in virtual reality.

About.title: About myself
About.content: I am a senior frontend developer with over 3 years of experience in the field. I have a strong background in web application architecture and a passion for teaching and mentoring others. I am currently exploring new generation frameworks such as Astro and Solid.js to continue improving my skills. In my free time, I enjoy exploring AI tools and making VFX.
